data.eml:eml: Species of Wadicosa (Araneae, Lycosidae): a new species from Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kronestedt, Torbjörn (2017): Species of Wadicosa (Araneae, Lycosidae): a new species from Madagascar. Zootaxa 4263 (3): 594-597, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4263.3.11
